channel.title: Bill Manning on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Bill Manning on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: How to write for multiple social media channels at once
item.description: I connected my Twitter feed to my Facebook feed; now I need to learn to write for both at once. Hard to do. Is there a way to be selective? One suggestion, from long-time blogger Prentiss Riddle, is to write things first in your weblog and then syndicate them out to wherever you want them to go. This is said to behave well with systems like Facebook that reward outbound clicks.
